category: Click Boards > Display & LED > LED segment
name: mikroe.click.alphanumg2
short_description: AlphaNum G 2 Click is a compact add-on board that represents an easy solution for adding numeric or hexadecimal displays to your application. This board features the LTP-3862, a dual-digit 16-segment alphanumeric green display from Lite-ON. It is a 0.3‚Äù (7.62mm) display with black face and white segments. The LED segments use common anodes, and besides segments, the decimal point (DP) dot is also available.
